apps.title: Lochbox: Communication Privacy
apps.description: Secure live chats, calls, and meetings in a private messenger that gives you exclusive control of your encryption. Like an adblock or antivirus for your conversations, Lochbox offers free voice and video calling, group messaging, and meetings that keeps trackers, hackers, and bad actors out. Protect your communications with friends and family, for your business or work and take comfort in knowing your personal, secret, and/or professional conversations can only be accessed by the intended parties. User-controlled Encryption Just because something is encrypted doesn’t mean it’s private or secure. If your service provider controls the encryption then they can access your content. When paired with our Key Manager app, Lochbox gives you exclusive custody of your encryption keys so only you can decide who has access. We couldn’t even view your content if we wanted to. Connect Privately Other messengers announce your registration to everyone in your contact list. We never share your account with anyone other than those you invite to connect. Lochbox even lets you keep your work and personal contacts and conversations separate so you can use the same device without exposing one to the other. Free Chats, Calls, and Meetings Send a message to one person or a thousand; talk using voice or video; meet or hangout with screen sharing on any supported device. Whether you don't like sharing your phone number or you don't have one we've got you covered.

apps.title: Speakap
apps.description: Speakap - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners Speakap is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners. Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners. Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk. The benefits of Speakap - Communicate wherever you are - Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere - Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements - No business email needed - Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization - Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for - All shared messages are secured - Important news will never be overlooked Security & Management Speakap is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should something go wrong, then there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems. Feature list: - Timeline - Video - Groups - messages - News - Locking and unlocking posts - Who has read my post? - Sharing files - Integrations - Notifications

apps.title: Slowly: Make Global Friends
apps.description: Slowly: Build Authentic Friendships at Your Own Pace "In a world dominated by instant messaging, meaningful connections have become a rare luxury." Slowly reimagines the art of correspondence, offering a unique way to make friends. Connect with penpals around the world and explore the beauty of cultural and linguistic exchange through thoughtfully written letters. Rediscover the joy of anticipation and dive into heartfelt, written conversations. Designed for those who prefer to take their time and focus on genuine connections, Slowly brings back the charm of traditional penpals. Each letter takes time to arrive—anywhere from a few hours to a few days—depending on the distance between you and your new friend. Whether you’re looking for foreign friends, a language exchange partner, or simply a quiet space to write a meaningful letter, Slowly is here for you. Key Features: ► Distance-Based Letter Delivery Each letter travels at a speed that reflects the physical distance between you and your friend, creating a sense of anticipation. With no pressure to respond instantly, you have time to reflect, compose your thoughts, and share your story. This slower pace nurtures deeper and more meaningful connections. ► Collect Over 2,000 Unique Stamps Turn every letter into an adventure by collecting unique regional stamps from across the globe. These stamps add a personal and cultural touch to your correspondence, serving as reminders of the friendships you create. ► A Safe and Secure Space for Everyone No photos, no real names—just your thoughts, shared in a secure and stress-free environment. Whether you're an introvert looking for deeper conversations or someone who values privacy, Slowly offers a safe place to express yourself and connect authentically. ► Unlimited Letters, Always Free Enjoy the art of writing without limits—send and receive as many letters as you like, completely free. Optional premium features are available to enhance your experience and meet your unique needs. Who Is Slowly For? - Anyone looking to make friends at their own pace, free from the rush of instant communication. - Language learners seeking partners for meaningful language exchange. - People who love writing letters and want to explore different cultures. - Introverts and thoughtful individuals who prefer calm, meaningful interactions. - Anyone hoping to meet new friends from all over the world. Slowly: Authentic Friendships, at Your Speed. Whether you’re looking to reconnect with the joy of letter writing, discover new perspectives, or simply build friendships that matter, Slowly is your perfect companion for creating meaningful connections in a fast-paced world. Terms of Service: https://slowly.app/terms/

apps.title: Flock: Team Communication App
apps.description: Flock is a powerful business messaging and team collaboration app that brings all your work into one place. Today, your team’s communication is scattered across emails, ad hoc messages, and multiple tools. With Flock you can quickly bring people together, discuss ideas, share information, assign tasks, and track team progress, so your team can focus on what they do best. Flock effortlessly adapts to your unique needs whether you are a large enterprise, a small business, or a high-growth startup. With Flock you can: • Communicate with colleagues and entire teams through 1-on-1 chats and group messaging • Create different channels for projects, departments, or topics for focused communications • Effortlessly search previous conversations and channels • Send and share files on-the-go • Hold video and audio calls with screen sharing capabilities • Use built-in productivity tools such as to-do’s, reminders, and polls • Integrate with all your favorite tools and services, including Google Drive, Trello, Jira, GitHub, Hubspot, etc. • Rest easy because your conversations are private, safe and secure (We are SOC2 and GDPR compliant) Flock is free to use for as long as you want. You can upgrade to our paid plans for enhanced features and increased user control.

apps.title: Proloquo
apps.description: AssistiveWare Proloquo is an intuitive, easy-to-use Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) app. Based on years of research, it is the only AAC app designed to meet the needs of all ages without sacrificing ease of use or efficiency. Proloquo is more than just a communication tool; it’s a gateway to language development and effective communication. AN EASY START With a unique design and quick one-tap access to the most used words, you can start using AAC right away. Finding any word is effortless, with an easily accessible Search function. Need to focus on or teach specific words? Use Focus Mode™ and draw attention without restricting or deleting words. THINKING SPACE (only available on iPad) Understanding a beginning communicator can feel like an endless guessing game, leading to frustration on both sides. Proloquo’s unique Thinking Space™ feature allows you to visualize and explore thoughts and meaning even with the earliest communicators. Arrange Proloquo’s visuals in any order for more intuitive communication. Understand each other faster and easier with Proloquo’s Thinking Space. GROWS WITH YOU Proloquo offers an extensive vocabulary unmatched in size and efficiency. With a user-friendly interface and innovative features such as Related Words™, Proloquo ensures everyone, from toddlers to adults, can discover, learn, and love language. Proloquo also offers a full keyboard with word prediction to support literacy. GET EXPERT AAC GUIDANCE WITH PROLOQUO COACH We know learning AAC can be challenging - that’s why we paired Proloquo with Proloquo Coach. Free with a Proloquo subscription, it equips families and educators with the tools and knowledge needed to support children and students in learning to communicate using AAC. With fast in-app support and guided practice, you will always know what to do next. SHARE PROLOQUO WITH YOUR TEAM FOR FREE Share Proloquo at no additional cost. Involve teachers, Speech Pathologists, and grandparents - download the Proloquo app and sync across multiple devices for free. Try Proloquo free for one month! How payment works • After your trial ends, payment will be charged to your Apple ID. • Subscriptions renew automatically. Payment is charged 24 hours before the current subscription period ends. • Don’t want to renew? Cancel more than 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. • Want to cancel or change your subscription? Manage it in your account settings on the App Store. The standard Apple Terms of Use apply to this app: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Rocket.Chat
apps.description: Rocket.Chat is a customizable open source communications platform for organizations with high standards of data protection. It enables real-time conversations between colleagues, with other companies or with your customers, across devices on web, desktop or mobile. The result is an increase in productivity and customer satisfaction rates. Everyday, tens of millions of users in over 150 countries and in organizations such as Deutsche Bahn, The US Navy and Credit Suisse trust Rocket.Chat to keep their communications completely private and secure. By opting for Rocket.Chat, users also benefit from free audio and video conferencing, guest access, screen and file sharing, LiveChat, LDAP Group Sync, two-factor authentication (2FA), E2E encryption, SSO, dozens of OAuth providers and unlimited users, guests, channels, messages, searches and files. Users can set up Rocket.Chat on cloud or by hosting their own servers on-premises. With thousands of contributors and stars on Github, Rocket.Chat has the world’s largest community of chat developers in the open source communication sector. When you choose Rocket.Chat, you join an ever-growing passionate community that constantly improves our platform with us :) KEY FEATURES: * Open Source Software * Hassle-free MIT license * BYOS (bring your own server) * Multiple Rooms * Direct Messages * Private & Public Channels/Groups * Desktop and Mobile Notifications * 100+ available integrations * Edit and Delete Sent Messages * Mentions * Avatars * Markdown * Emojis * Choose between 3 themes: Light, Dark, Black * Sort conversations alphabetically or group by activity, unread or favourites * Transcripts / History * File Upload / Sharing * I18n - [Internationalization with Lingohub] * Hubot Friendly - [Hubot Integration Project] * Media Embeds * Link Previews * LDAP Authentication * REST-full APIs * Remote Locations Video Monitoring * Native Cross-Platform Desktop Application

apps.title: Vocera Vina
apps.description: Vocera Vina is a secure healthcare smartphone application that operates on the Vocera Platform to simplify and expedite clinical communication. Unify calls, messages, alerts, alarms, and care teams around the patient in a single app customizable to all hospital roles. The app allows you to call by name, group, or broadcast, and integrates with more than 140 clinical and operational systems. Return calls with one touch and use a single login to call and securely text. Take real-time situational awareness to the next level – secure texts include patient, event, and care team context. Keep your most important information front and center with a prioritized home screen where messages manage themselves based on intelligent rules you set. Vocera System Requirements: Vocera Platform 6.4

apps.title: Zoom Workplace for Intune
apps.description: Zoom Workplace for Intune is for admins to organize and help protect BYOD environments with mobile application management (MAM). This app helps admins to protect corporate data while keeping employees connected. Reimagine how you work with Zoom Workplace, an all-in-one, AI-powered collaboration platform that combines team chat, meetings, phone, whiteboard, calendar, mail, notes, and more. If you are looking for the end-user version of Zoom Workplace, download it here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zoom-cloud-meetings/id546505307?mt=8 Zoom Workplace for Intune gives enterprise users all the features they expect from Zoom, while providing IT administrators expanded mobile app management capabilities to help prevent leakage of company information. And in the event of a lost or stolen device, IT can remove Zoom Workplace from the iPhone or iPad, along with any sensitive data associated with it. IMPORTANT: This software requires your company’s work account and a Microsoft managed environment. Some functionality may not be available in all countries. If you have issues with this software or have questions about the use of it (including questions about your company’s privacy policy), please contact your company’s IT Administrator. Follow us on social media @zoom Have a question? Contact us at http://support.zoom.us.

apps.title: HeyPal - Walkie Talkie Pro
apps.description: HeyPal is a groundbreaking social app designed for instant and urgent communication, making it effortless to stay connected with family, friends, and colleagues. It transforms your phone into a quick connect tool, allowing you to receive voice messages without unlocking your device, even in silent mode, ensuring efficient and immediate communication in any situation. Have you ever faced situations where your messages vanish or your calls go unnoticed in your everyday life? Perhaps the other person is busy with other matters, or maybe their phone is simply on silent mode. When you urgently need to communicate, simply hold down HeyPal's talk button to send a voice message, which will be played at a sufficient volume. Even if the call is rejected, your voice message will be delivered instantly. [Walkie-Talkie on Your Phone] - Provides high-quality voice communication without distance limits. [Emergency Calls] - Voice messages can be heard even when the phone is on silent mode. [Simple and Efficient] - Easy to use without complicated operations! [Group Chat] - Using HeyPal's group feature makes business operations, family communications, and interactions with friends more efficient. HeyPal - the solution to unreturned messages, enabling limitless communication and ensuring instant connections! Whether it's outdoor adventures or everyday communication, HeyPal meets your communication needs in various scenarios, ensuring that each message is effectively delivered. Terms of Service: https://uu2.me/about/terms.html Privacy Policy: https://uu2.me/about/privacy.html

apps.title: TeamLive
apps.description: TeamLive is a highly intuitive and useful team scheduling and communication platform, built specifically for the hospitality industry by seasoned hospitality professionals.. Featuring a simple design and real-time collaboration features, the app allows you to easily view your work schedule and seamlessly communicate with your co-workers, all from your mobile device. The app gives you more freedom to plan your personal life. With Team Scheduling, you can dynamically view your work schedule across devices by day, week, or month; be alerted to new or updated work schedules; and take comfort in the built-in functionality to prevent scheduling conflicts (because there’s nothing worse than being understaffed for dinner rush). The TeamLive app is modeled after the social media you use every day, so communication has never been easier. With Team Communication, you and your team can stay in sync with company goals, status updates, and more—all from one dashboard. Easily submit time-off requests, update your availability for upcoming schedules, and trade shifts with other employees—all from the app (so you can say goodbye to those group chats forever.) The TeamLive app has all of the scheduling & communication tools you need, in one place!

apps.title: DialMyCalls: Mass Text & Voice
apps.description: DialMyCalls is your go-to solution for mass communication. Send mass text messages, voice broadcasts, and emergency alerts in seconds. Whether you're a business, school, church, or community leader, you have the tools to communicate quickly, clearly, and affordably. What You Can Do Send high-volume text messages using our intuitive mass texting platform. Broadcast voice messages to thousands with our voice broadcast app Use the free version to message up to 25 contacts weekly — perfect for small groups Schedule automated text messages and voice calls for future delivery Set up auto-reply texts and SMS auto-response messages Group your contacts to send targeted SMS and voice messages Access mass calling features with voicemail drop if calls go unanswered Use Cases Schools and Educators - Share emergency notifications, closure alerts, and event reminders with parents, staff, and students using our school text messaging tools Businesses and Enterprises - Send time-sensitive SMS alerts for internal updates, shift changes, and operations Churches and Faith Groups - Notify members of service times, fundraisers, or prayer meetings with group texts and automated voice calls HOAs and Residential Communities - Share maintenance notices, event updates, or urgent alerts with mass SMS and voice messages Events and Conferences - Manage guest lists and send reminders or updates for weddings, conferences, and local gatherings Emergency Services - Distribute emergency notifications instantly with our mass call and text broadcast features Healthcare Providers - Send appointment reminders, health updates, and vaccination alerts using SMS and auto-reply messaging Marketing and Promotions - Promote flash sales, special offers, and new products with mass text campaigns Contractors and Service Providers - Keep customers informed with text alerts for appointments, updates, and service delays Training and Workshops - Notify attendees of schedule changes, materials, and logistics with group texting and auto-response features How It Works Type or record a message. Select your contacts. Send or schedule instantly. Unanswered voice calls go directly to voicemail. Flexible Access Everything syncs in real time across mobile and desktop. Secure and Private DialMyCalls keeps your data safe. We never sell your contact information. All communications are encrypted and compliant with leading data standards. Why We’re Different Free to get started — message up to 25 contacts weekly Pay-as-you-go pricing with no subscriptions or contracts Works as a business texting platform or emergency notification system Includes voicemail drop, push-to-talk, and press-1 calling options Supports message scheduling, auto-replies, and two-way texting Works with landline texting and web-to-phone broadcasting Offers real-time delivery reports, opt-out management, and voice logs Trusted by over 40,000 organizations nationwide US-based support available 7 days a week Need help? Call 1-800-928-2086 or visit DialMyCalls.com to learn more. Terms of Service: https://www.dialmycalls.com/termsofservice Privacy Policy: https://www.dialmycalls.com/privacypolicy

Expanded support for 10 new languages: French, Chinese, German, Korean, Portuguese (Brazilian), Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Danish. Customize speech speed and use up to 2000 characters. - Smarter App Behavior The app now unregisters old push tokens when you log out to prevent receiving messages from another account. - Better Recording & Contact Management Contact imports now show a progress bar for better visibility. You can now search through your past recordings. Recording list has been improved for clarity and consistency. - Fixes & Performance Fixed layout issues with the recording modal and phone links. apps.title: ParentSquare
apps.description: What is ParentSquare? ParentSquare helps schools and families stay connected and informed—all in one easy place. Whether it’s a quick message from a teacher, an important alert from the district, or a reminder about tomorrow’s field trip, ParentSquare makes sure families never miss a thing. Why families and teachers love ParentSquare: • Simple, easy-to-use app and website • Messages are automatically translated into 190+ languages • Best-in-class safety and security practices • One place for all school updates, alerts, and messages With ParentSquare, families and staff save time and stay connected—so everyone can focus on helping students succeed. ParentSquare for iOS The ParentSquare app makes it easy for families to stay in the loop and engage with their child’s school community. With the app, parents and guardians can: • See school news, classroom updates, and photos • Receive important notices like attendance alerts and cafeteria balances • Message teachers and staff directly • Join group conversations • Sign up for wishlist items, volunteering, and conferences • Respond to absences or tardies* • Pay school-related fees and invoices* * If included with your school's implementation

apps.title: Cisco Jabber
apps.description: Cisco Jabber™ for iPhone and iPad is a collaboration application that provides presence, instant messaging (IM), voice, voice messaging, and video calling capabilities on Apple iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch. Escalate your Jabber calls into multi-party conferencing with Cisco WebEx® Meetings. This application supports the following capabilities: • Integrated voice • High-quality video with interoperability to Cisco video endpoints • IM, presence • Visual voicemail • One-tap escalation to WebEx meetings (cross-launches the Cisco WebEx® Meetings application) Device and Operating System Requirements: The latest Cisco Jabber for iPhone and iPad Release is supported on iOS 18 and iPadOS 18. iPhone models compatible with iOS18: https://support.apple.com/guide/iphone/iphone-models-compatible-with-ios-18-iphe3fa5df43/18.0/ios/18.0 iPad models compatible with iPadOS 18: https://support.apple.com/guide/ipad/ipad-models-compatible-with-ipados-18-ipad213a25b2/ipados For more information about Cisco Jabber, visit: http://www.cisco.com/go/jabber IMPORTANT: If connecting to Cisco Unified Communications Manager, administrators must enable the correct Cisco Jabber for iPhone and iPad configurations, or proper connectivity will not be established. For details, review the latest Cisco Jabber Installation and Configuration Guide, and Server Setup Guide. IMPORTANT: Most of the features described above are specific to a particular system configuration. Please check with your IT administrator to determine the specific features that are available to you. apps.title: Communication  & Interpersonal Skills - Study Notes, Tips & Quizzes (free)
apps.description: Communication & Interpersonal skills. Interpersonal communication is an exchange of information between two or more people. It is also an area of study. Communication skills are developed and may be enhanced or improved with increased knowledge and practice. During interpersonal communication there is message sending and message receiving. This can be conducted using both direct and indirect methods. Successful interpersonal communication is when the message senders and the message receivers understand the message. With this app you can learn on the Go & everywhere. Our Learners Don't just meet standards, They exceed them. This is a Combination of sets, containing concepts, practice questions and study cards for practical exam preparation on the topic of Interpersonal Communication. Get +1560 Terms, Concepts, Quizzes , Study notes & practice cases. This application allows you to expand your communication knowledge, widen your Interpersonal Communication expertise, improve your practice skills, Broaden your career & academic horizons. Invest in your Success Now. Your investment in knowledge, professionalism & expertise is durable with a High added value, it's a High return investment. This app is suitable not only for Interpersonal Communication practitioners but also for public relation practitioners, politician, marketing & advertisement professionals, social researchers & CPA, CMA, CIA, ACCA, CA, ACA, CFA, CFE, CISA, PMP, AP, CGAP, CRMA, CTP, CPP, CFP candidates. -The Content & design of this application is developed to satisfy the exact exam candidates needs -We keep the application as simple as possible to let the learner focus only on the content -The Flashcards are exam oriented and designed to enhance quick memorization -The application is designed to let you gain time and efficiency -The Flashcards wording enhances easy understanding to ensure higher exam score. This App energized your creativity, showcases your talents and strength your self-confidence during the exam & daily work. You will get better understanding, less preparation time & a better score in the exam. -This application is downloaded and used by graduate & undergraduate students, teachers, lecturers, professionals, PhD, researchers, reviewers not only in the US but also in Philippines, Canada, India, Australia, Turkey, Russia, UK, GCC, India, Saudi Arabia, Nigeria, and all over the world. Main Features: - Exam questions and study notes - 5 study modes - Shareable content - Settings: with flexibility to change font size & background control. A large number of scholars collectively identify with and use the term interpersonal communication to describe their own work. These scholars, however, also recognize that there is a considerable variety in how they and their colleagues conceptually and operationally define this area of study. Culture has a strong dependence on communication because of the help it provides in the process of exchanging information in the objective to transmit ideas, feelings, and specific situations present in the person’s mind. This means the more different an individuals cultural background is, the more different their styles of communication will be . It is stressed that there is an importance of cultural safety which is the recognition of social, economic and political positions of individuals before beginning communication. There are 5 major elements related to culture that affect the communication process: This is a Communication Diagram showing the two different types of communication that can be done between cultures. It is then further broken down into how you appropriately communicate verbally or non verbally with individuals of different cultures. Cultural history Religion Value (personal and cultural) Social organization Language

apps.title: Weave Chat AAC
apps.description: Weave Chat AAC is a free, dynamic, and completely customizable AAC app that is available to a variety of devices. Weave Chat AAC offers a large variety of verbs (green), pronouns (yellow), questions (purple), nouns (tan/orange), adjectives (blue), and conversational words (pink). All color choices were made based on the Fitzgerald Key and new vocabulary is added weekly. Users can add their own custom images and categories in Settings —> Manage Custom Images. In addition, users can add their own custom phrases that can easily be accessed from their board; to add phrases, go to Settings —> Manage Phrases. Users can select a synthetic voice (dependent on their device settings) from Settings —> Change Voice Settings - here you can select your voice, vocal pitch, and rate of speech. Image and text size can be personalized from Settings —> Change Image & Text Size (select from default - small, medium, and large). Settings —> Configure Image Keyboard allows the user to turn on/off features that allow for the category text to be read aloud (synthetic voice for categories), to keep the user in the category after a image has been selected (stay on category after image selection), and disable the speech output for individual words so that it only reads aloud when the white text screen is touched (synthetic voice disabled for individual words). The AAC board can be modified in Settings —> Manage Board Builder. Here, the user can select from the default board (you must make a copy to edit it - to do this select “Add new keyboard” and then select “Hide Images” for Type of Keyboard); grid position boards (ranging in size from 1x2 - 7x15 rows/columns); and Board Builder (gives you the option to build a board from scratch). All boards are completely editable and all custom images and categories can be used from all boards. Lastly, Manage Pin Configuration allows the user to set a pin over all (or just some) aspects of customization to lock down features as needed. Feature List: - Dynamic, customizable, AAC boards - Large variety of verbs, nouns, and adjectives with additional vocabulary added weekly - Add custom images and custom categories - Create and save phrases - Select a synthetic voice (as available per your device settings) - Copy & Paste AAC picture icon messages via “share” - Create and/or modify AAC boards via 3 options: grid position boards (ranging from 1x2 - 7x15), hide images, and/or create a new board from scratch - “Text” others who have the app using AAC picture icons - Set a passcode to lock down features as needed - Weave Chat AAC currently only has English buttons/images

apps.title: Pyrus · Team Communication
apps.description: Pyrus is the team communication tool for your entire business. It incorporates real-time messaging, task delegation, and approval flows. Finally, all your tasks and conversations are in one easy-to-use interface. - Communicate: every task is a message thread working towards a specific goal. - Delegate: every task has a single person responsible for it at any given moment. - Organize: hide a task from your inbox when you don’t need to act, or snooze it when you want a friendly reminder later. - Track: a powerful search capability makes it easy to find the details you need. - Anywhere: Pyrus syncs seamlessly across all your devices and even works offline. FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS - Swipe right to hide a task from your inbox and stand by, swipe left to archive it and mark it as complete. - Forward any email to x@pyrus.com to turn it into a task. - Attach documents, photos, or files from cloud storage like Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. - Use subtasks to split a large task into a list of action items. - Get a notification whenever your action or input is requested. - Share images and documents from other apps. Pyrus is free to use for an unlimited number of people, offering upgradeable plans for extended usage, increased storage, unlimited API calls, and custom data access policies. - Login with your G+ account - Invite colleagues from Address Book - Work with outsourcers and subcontractors. *** Notifications - Badge on app icon shows the number of unread tasks in your Inbox - You receive push notification when something important happens with your tasks in Pyrus Pyrus works offline and seamlessly syncs in background. No frozen UI, no duplicates.

apps.title: GoTools by Proximiti
apps.description: GoTools by Proximiti is a set of information tools for on the go individuals, particularly network marketing professionals. Tools include Shout!, a multimedia messaging system that lets individuals rapidly communicate with their hierarchy and with custom lists of individuals. To support Shout!, it also includes automatic synchronization between the device's contacts and the Shout! Address book, and MyLibrary to store media assets obtained from the device and elsewhere. It also contains an organization level phone book, bulletin board, calendar, push notifications, and web links. Organization level information can only be modified by the administrator. The application then provides convenient, read-only access to that information. You should only download this application if you have previously obtained credentials approved by the organization administrator. There is no ability to obtain an account independently.

apps.title: GroupSpot
apps.description: Everyone knows email is messy, chat is noisy, social media is spyware, and single-purpose apps are exhausting. It doesn’t have to be this way. At GroupSpot, we’ve built the ultimate group communications platform optimized for community, utility, and privacy. Groups have all the tools they need to succeed in a single solution, whether it’s a small circle of friends or a town sports league. When it comes to group communications, you won’t find a platform with more flexibility and efficiency than GroupSpot. Here’s a few groups using GroupSpot today: Families Share meaningful moments and big wins with the wider family. You now have a home for all those moments only your cousins would care about: curtain call at the grade school play, mom crossing the finish line in the local 5k, and dad’s epic fail on the trampoline. In between, GroupSpot ensures you’re on top of Family Birthdays, Graduations, and Anniversaries. Community Groups Be a hometown hero and bring your local community into the 21st century with GroupSpot. apps.title: Crait - Secure Communication
apps.description: What is Crait? Crait is where secure communication and collaboration happens. It is a secure messaging tool designed to make working life easier and more productive for work-groups. Why Crait? The simple answer is: Businesses need to protect their digital assets. Businesses are targets and will be targets of cyber hacking because they have information valuable to would-be criminals. No sector of corporate America is excluded from the threat of cyber hacking. This is why at Crait, we believe that business communication deserves a security upgrade. What Crait provides - Secure one-on-one or group calls and can support chats with up to 1000 people. - Messages that self-destruct after the messages are read. - End-to-end encryption between the sender’s device and the recipient such that the encryption key never leaves the device; no party in the middle. - Secure chat, voice, as well as file-sharing capabilities to work-groups. - Secure email for Crait-to-Crait users. Pro edition service - Length of subscription: one month - Price: $2.99 per month - Payment: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase - Turned off: Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period - Auto-renewal: Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal - Account management: Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase - Privacy policy: https://www.craitapp.com/useragreement.php - Payment terms of use: https://www.craitapp.com/permission/index.html#/agreement - Auto-renewal terms of use: https://www.craitapp.com/permission/index.html#/renewagreement

apps.title: Join - Medical Communication
apps.description: Join is the hub for healthcare professionals and providers. It simplifies communication and collaboration between clinicians and healthcare providers through its secure and compliant patient information sharing technology. Join also enables clinicians to view high-resolution CT/MRI images via a DICOM viewer anywhere, reducing the need for them to switch between sites and helping speed up care delivery without sacrificing quality. Join easily integrates into internal IT systems such as PACS and EMR*, enabling users to view and share EHR information*, various diagnostic images, laboratory data*, and prescriptions*. * This feature is optional and currently limited to a few specific EMRs Join is also certified as a software medical device by PMDA (Japan), FDA (United States), CE (European Economic Area), and ANVISA (Brazil). Functions: - Connect to internal systems in hospitals such as PACS - Support private 1 on 1 chatting and group chatting - Use as medical cooperation tool between hospitals - Send and receive DICOM images in a chat, within a hospital, and between hospitals - Watch live streaming video from ICU, operation rooms, and patients’ room Security: - Anonymity processing for patients' personal information by gateway server - Encrypting chat data which was saved on device - Encrypting by using VPN connection between Inner-hospital system and Cloud - TLS/SSL encryption between devices and Cloud - Preventing unauthorized access by requiring passcode at application startup - Non-downloadable medical images (clearing cache each time) - ISMS (ISO27001) certified Note - Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

apps.title: Learn Communication Skills
apps.description: Learn Communication Skills A decade-and-a-half later, with the rise of social media networking and texting, communication is becoming more casual, even in situations where more formal ways of communicating are required. What this means is that people from the younger generation, may not know or even understand the importance of effective communication skills in the workplace. When you take a look at the greatest leaders, one of the traits they possess, is the ability to communicate effectively, which underscores the importance of communication skills. Alpha Z Studio provides you communication skills app in which you will learn how to communicate with people in a good way. More details are given below. types of communication Your communication skills will fall under four categories of communication. Let's take a closer look at each area. 1. Written communication Writing is one of the more traditional aspects of communication. We often write as part of our job, communicating via email and messenger apps like Slack, as well as in more formal documents, like project reports and white papers. Conveying information clearly, concisely, and with an accurate tone of voice are all important parts of written communication. 2. Verbal communication Communicating verbally is how many of us share information in the workplace. This can be informal, such as chatting with coworkers about an upcoming deliverable, or more formal, such as meeting with your manager to discuss your performance. 3. Non-verbal communication The messages you communicate to others can also take place non-verbally—through your body language, eye contact, and overall demeanor. You can cultivate strong non-verbal communication by using appropriate facial expressions, nodding, and making good eye contact. Really, verbal communication and body language must be in sync to convey a message clearly. 4. Visual communication Lastly, visual communication means using images, graphs, charts, and other non-written means to share information. Often, visuals may accompany a piece of writing or stand alone. In either case, it's a good idea to make sure your visuals are clear and strengthen what you're sharing. Why Is Effective Communication Important? Effective communication is vital both in and out of the workplace because it allows you to clearly translate your intentions and feelings into easily understandable messages. Effective communication makes you a more productive worker and cuts down on unintended consequences that arise as a result of miscommunication. Developing an effective communication process helps you understand what others are saying and makes you a better collaborator and team member. Developing advanced communication skills begins with simple interactions. Communication skills can be practiced every day in settings that range from the social to the professional. New skills take time to refine, but each time you use your communication skills, you open yourself to opportunities and future partnerships. If you like our app then please give us 5 star ratings. we are trying our best to make the learning process more easy and simple for you.

apps.title: Patient Communicator
apps.description: The Patient Communicator by the Society of Critical Care Medicine is designed to improve communication among patients, families, and caregivers. With translations in 18 languages; a diary feature; options to easily communicate about pain, moods, and needs; a glossary of terms and other education materials for patients and families; the Patient Communicator app can help ease the stress of a hospital stay. Features include: - A diary function that allows patients to track their daily progress during and after a hospital stay - Translation capabilities that allow for two-way communication in 18 languages on a variety of topics, such as pain, basic needs, feelings, and moods - A scale that allows patients to identify where on the body they feel sensations of pain, itching, and nausea and express the intensity of these sensations - More than 30 translatable phrases that allow patients to express various needs related to their care and well-being - A glossary of terms to help educate patients and families about the intensive care unit - A free download of the booklet Understanding Your ICU Stay: Information for Patients and Families Available translation languages: - English - Español (Spanish) - Mandarin (普通话 ) - Dutch (Nederlands) - Hindi - French (Français) - Italiano - Portuguese (Portuges) - Russian - Swedish (Svenska) - Czech (Čeština) - Polnisch (Polski/Polish) - Turkish - Ukrainian (українська) - Lithuanian (Lietuvių) - Arabic - German (Deutsch) - Japanese Contact ​support@sccm.org for more information.

apps.title: NMCPHC Risk Communication APPs
apps.description: The purpose of these APPs is to reinforce key aspects of risk communication. The APPs include brief discussions and role play, and provide a refresher for those who have attended the Risk Communication training sponsored by the Navy and Marine Corps Public Health Center. These workshops provide risk communication strategies and hands-on practical skills for those communications that impact your mission. These have become critical in the age of social media and the 24 hour news cycle. More and more information is being disseminated to a wider audience, at a quicker pace. Some of this information is accurate, some is not, so knowing how to respond is critical to accomplishing your organization’s mission. This includes knowing how to respond when communicating with the media, the public, the entire military community and military family members. What we say and how we say it can have a profound impact on people's perceptions and opinions, and can result in negative impacts if we don't choose our words carefully.

raw_data.release_note: Fixed video playback issue.
raw_data.description: The purpose of these APPs is to reinforce key aspects of risk communication. The APPs include brief discussions and role play, and provide a refresher for those who have attended the Risk Communication training sponsored by the Navy and Marine Corps Public Health Center. These workshops provide risk communication strategies and hands-on practical skills for those communications that impact your mission. These have become critical in the age of social media and the 24 hour news cycle. More and more information is being disseminated to a wider audience, at a quicker pace. Some of this information is accurate, some is not, so knowing how to respond is critical to accomplishing your organization’s mission. This includes knowing how to respond when communicating with the media, the public, the entire military community and military family members. What we say and how we say it can have a profound impact on people's perceptions and opinions, and can result in negative impacts if we don't choose our words carefully.

apps.title: BAND for Kids
apps.description: BAND for Kids is a group communication app designed for youth (ages 12 and under) to stay connected with their families, sports teams, scout troops, and more. BAND for Kids is a safe space for adolescents to interact within a private social platform, while allowing parents and guardians to moderate activity. ◆ Easy to get started: - Kids can get started by following these three steps: 1) Download BAND for Kids app to a mobile phone or tablet. 2) Use an email address to sign up (parent consent is required). 3) Join a private Band by parents or guardian invitation. ◆ How parents and kids communicate together safely: - Kids cannot join groups they were NOT invited to. - Parents can monitor which group their kids have joined. - Parents can follow their children’s BAND activity by also joining their groups. ◆ Safer environment for kids to communicate: - No harassment from strangers. - No advertisements and in-app purchases. - Kids cannot create or invite themselves to Bands/Pages. - Kids cannot search or join public Bands. ◆ Available features for kids: - Admin of the Band can determine which features are available to the Kids users. - With BAND for Kids, adolescent users can publish posts on the Community Board and attach files, images, or videos to the posts. They can also chat with other members of their Bands. ◆ Accessibility: - BAND for Kids is available on any device including smart phones, tablets, and PC. ◆ Private and Secure - BAND has acquired the SOC 2 and 3 certificates for its privacy protection and ISO/IEC27001 Certification for outstanding information security management systems.

apps.title: PENN Connect
apps.description: Penn Connect - The social platform for our organization: for employees and external partners Penn Connect is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. Consisting of timelines, news feeds and chat features, similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners. Share new knowledge, ideas and internal successes quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners. Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Convenient, especially if you do not work behind a desk. The benefits of Penn Connect - Communicate wherever you are - Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere - Share ideas, have discussions and share successes - No business email needed - Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization - Save time by reducing e-mail and find what you're looking for - All shared messages are secured - Important news will never be overlooked Feature list: - Timeline - Video - Groups - messages - News - Locking and unlocking posts - Who has read my post? - Sharing files - Integrations - Notifications

apps.title: Elevate UC
apps.description: Elevate UC 4+ Elevate Cloud Communications On-the-Go Download the Elevate Mobile App for use with Elevate UC so you can call, chat, meet, and more, anywhere work takes you. The Elevate Mobile App transforms your mobile phone into an essential collaboration tool, making teamwork on the go easier than ever. Place and receive calls, see who is available, chat with colleagues, host or join meetings, and manage voicemails all from one application – anytime, anywhere. Never Miss Important Calls Extend your business phone number and extension to your mobile phone, so you can place and receive calls on the go or even transfer calls from your desktop phone to your mobile device – seamlessly, without interruption. Easily Collaborate From Anywhere Your desktop chat is synchronized in real-time with your mobile device so you can stay connected and continue conversations no matter where you are. Now, with Elevate AI Assistant, you can effortlessly access information and simplify your daily tasks using the power of generative AI technology. All Your Important Collaboration Tools Right on Your Mobile Device, Including: • An integrated, searchable corporate contact list • One-tap calling of your contacts • One-tap calling into conference bridges • The ability to manage multiple calls at once • Voicemail transcription • Advanced calling features: • Call transfers – blind and warm • Call Flip – quickly flip between mobile and desk phone during active calls • Call Forwarding – allows greater flexibility to customize call flows based on specific, predetermined schedules, number of rings, and routing instructions to other users or phone numbers • Team chat and messaging • Elevate AI Assistant – an integrated generative AI tool, that provides quick, helpful responses to a variety of tasks via Elevate chat • The ability to host and attend meetings • The ability to securely access and share files (requires ShareSync Mobile App) IMPORTANT: The Elevate Mobile App requires an Elevate UC account. * LEGAL DISCLAIMERS 1. It is important that you understand the 911 policies before using this product. For more information on these policies, please see https://www.serverdata.net/legal/911Notifications-VTS.pdf 2. Call quality may be affected when using Wi-Fi or Cellular Data. 3. International and roaming data charges from your mobile carrier may apply. 4. You are responsible for ensuring that all call recordings comply with any applicable federal or state law (including consent requirements.) 5. By downloading Elevate UC, you agree to the terms of the End User License Agreement and acknowledge that you accept the Privacy Policy, and the AI Policy and Notifications within the following links (see https://serverdata.net/legal/eula.aspx, https://www.serverdata.net/legal/privacy-policy.aspx, and https://www.serverdata.net/legal/ai-policy-notifications.aspx).
